name: phpJobScheduler
short_description:
Designed to automate tasks by scheduling scripts to run at set intervals - the scripts to run can be local or remote and can be on a secure directory where a username/password access is required.

Requires PHP and MySQL on the local server/web hosting account.

phpJobScheduler is a replacement for cron jobs.
summary: a scheduler to run any scripts locally or remote - replaces cron tab
